question: Which country has recently announced that it would stop the funding provided to the World Health Organisation (WHO)?
explanation:
The President of the United States Donald Trump has recently accused the World Health Organisation (WHO) for allegedly supporting China during the initial stage of the pandemic of coronavirus.
As per the President, the WHO failed to investigate the conflicts between the official reports from the Chinese government and other reliable reports. He also highlighted that the US provides $400 million and $500 million per year to the WHO and announced that the funding would be stopped.
